home.description: My name is Roger, I'm a curious fullstack engineer who loves to learn new things and build cool stuff.

about.title: About me
about.description: Now a days, I live in Barcelona, spain. I'm {age} years old. I'm studing a Multiplatform Aplication Development course at the hight school La Salle Online.
about.description2: I start to learn about web development in 2019, at second of the intermediate cycle of the high school in the subject of "Aplicacions web" where I learned to use diferent technologies and content managers like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Wordpress and Moodle.
about.description3: Right now, I'm improving my skills in web development learning back-end technologies like PHP, MySQL, Laravel or node. Also I'm learning front-end technologies like React or Node.js. To complete all this subjects, I have some knowledges about UX/UI design.
about.description4: If you want more information about me, you can acces to my <guidelines>Linkedin</guidelines> or my <portfolio>personal web portfolo</portfolio>.
about.description5: If you want to contact me, you can send me an email to <email>rogerbarrero@gmail.com</email>.

projects1.name: Barcelona city
projects1.description: This project, made for a subject of the high school of DAW in La Salle, is an informative landing page of the city of Barcelona and surroundings. It was made with HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

projects2.name: Mr.Crypto rarity calculator
projects2.description: Mr.Crypto is a private community that can only be accessed through a digital collectible. This project made in ract.js, is a calculator of the rarities of the collectibles.

projects3.name: Bookers rarity calculator
projects3.description: Bookers is a private community of readers that can only be accessed through a digital collectible. This project made in next.js and tailwind, is a calculator of the rarities of the collectibles.

projects4.name: Calculator
projects4.description: It is a calculator prepared to perform basic mathematical operations.

projects5.name: Multiplication app
projects5.description: It is an application that gives you multiplications and you have to solve them.

projects6.name: Digital clock
projects6.description: It is a digital clock that shows the current time.

projects7.name: Character counter
projects7.description: It is an application that counts the characters of a text in real time.

projects8.name: Random color generator
projects8.description: It is an application that generates random colors and shows you their hexadecimal code.

projects9.name: Time in your city
projects9.description: It is an application that shows you the time in your city.

projects10.name: League results
projects10.description: It is an application that shows you the results of the league.

projects11.name: Currency exchange
projects11.description: It is an app that shows you the currency exchange in real time.

projects12.name: Flights arrival in Barcelona
projects12.description: It is an app that shows all the flights that arrive at Barcelona.

projects13.name: Comkedem web redesign
projects13.description: It the redesign for the CKM app to improve the UX and UI.

projects14.name: castIA
projects14.description: Training of an artificial intelligence and frontend development of the application to help prepare the season efficiently.

javafx1.name: Database reader
javafx1.description: This project is a JavaFX application that reads a database and shows the data in a table.

javafx2.name: Database editor
javafx2.description: This project is a JavaFX application that reads a database and allows you to edit the data.

degree.Solidity: Smart Contracts with solidity from A to Z
degree.monitor: Leisure and free time monitor course

nsign.title: NSIGN.TV
nsign.description:
• Design and develop of diferent applet utilities for the clients
    • View the flights to arrive at Barcelona
    • Change Euro - Dolar in live
    • View the next matches in La Liga
    • Time in the location of the device (or that marks the browser you are using)
    • View upcoming events on a calendar
  • Analysis of the UX of the platform and making proposals for improvement

aecc.title: Asociación española contra el cáncer
aecc.description: Carry out different tasks to stimulate the group of medium-sized children (10 - 13 years old) in the Summer Camps carried out annually by the Spanish Association Against Cancer in Salardú (Vall d'aran)

ckm.title: Comkedem Sports and Education Association
ckm.description: • Design of the different sections of the website for a future update in wordpress

ckm2.title: Comkedem Sports and Education Association
ckm2.description: • Carry out diferent group dynamization tasks in the Sports Center (between 8 and 15 years old) and in the Autonomus States (Between 16 and 18) carried out every summer by the Comkedem Association

ies.title: IES Alt Penedes
ies.description:
• Installation, update and configuration of operating systems and accesory software for newly acquired laptops
  • Installation of audiovisual equipment in the classrooms
  • Preparation of audiovisuals for the days of open doors of the academic year 2020-2021
  • Collaboration in the installation and configuration of the Moodle platform to be able to carry out the telematic classes during the COVID 19 lockdown

tv.title: Los espabilados
tv.description: • Extra in the series 'Los Espabilados' of Movistar Plus+

cem.title: BCR CEM L'Hospitalet
cem.description: • Instructor of disability awareness activities in schools using various adapted sports.

bledbonds.title: BledBonds
bledbonds.description:
• Design, development, and deployment of a dating app for people with disabilities, including a web platform and a mobile application.
  • The project focused not only on code quality but also on accessibility and user experience.

ia.msg: Hello, My name is Ruugii GPT, Roger's personal assistant. How can I help you today?
